title: AFK/Queue Dodgers
body:
So I hear Riot will finally be taking more action against the AFK/Queue Dodger players and wondered what the penalties will be?

Hoping it's an hour ban for dodging and a week ban for AFK.

Thanks Riot nice to see you will be banning these type of people for longer.



Oh wait never mind, I was just dreaming.

replies.body:
Interesting post...

I'm surprised you think this way actually, most players I've seen believe that queue dodge penalties are already too harsh as it is.

**Here's the thing; **
Punishments for dodging can be tricky. 

+  If they are too lenient players will simply dodge match-ups or team compositions they don't like. 
+ If they are too harsh then players have to pay large consequences to dodge uncooperative team-mates or trolls. This puts toxic players in a position of power.

I get that players who dodge queue can be annoying, but it's really important for many people that we keep penalties around where they are now. We want players to see dodging as a viable method to escape from the occasional bad game.
> 
> **Riot** almost triples  [dodge penalties](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) for some queues such as ARAM, but at the end of the day it's usually not worth it to trade a minor inconvenience for a full 20 minutes of negative experience.
> 

You're welcome to have your opinion here, but I'd like you to be aware of why most of the community might be against extremely harsh punishments like the ones you listed.

OK I might of been a little harsh with a one week ban but if you start banning dodgers for an hour they will be less likely to dodge and most dodge because they didn't get the champ they wanted so if you think higher penalties is a bad idea make it so dodgers are stuck with the champ they had.

So I was playing ranked, and I lost 2 games in a row... and then I queued a 3rd time and got matched with the same 3 people that I had lost the previous 2 games with... 1 was trolling in the second game... why don't you have so precaution for that kind of matchmaking, it seems absurd that I am losing the game before the match started because it matched with these people. I dodged this 3rd game because of this and got a mark against my name. I feel like this is unfair to me even within the toxic community that is the league with the number of times I am told to kill myself etc. its absurd that the matchmaking is matchmaking me back with the same people. 

P.S they were even on my block list when I got matched with them

Riot don't even care.
They're condoning trolling this season by turning a blind eye to it or going "its perfectly acceptable" which raises the question of how has no one gone full ISIS on them yet.

Queue dodging is just like "meh, punish him because he wants to progress in ranked hurrhurr"
